data.message: how did one of the the greatest rappers ever pair up with this disgusting bitch??

replies.message: Illuminati
coz dats de best bitch de is to pair wit...
Law of attraction
probably that's his daughter's favorite singer
shes an amazing singer...but i just dont like her for some reason...probably cuz im a madddd hater hahaha
"disgusting" Your opinion is shit. I'm not a fan of her, but she's clearly not disgusting either.
u r right she is not disgusting...i apologize for that outburst...i guess  i just got angry seeing my idol touring with someone like her
She is a devil worshipper and that's why she is disgusting, eminem isn't better either.... Notice the devil horns he are doing with his fingers.. Ugh!
She's the best bitch that was paired with Eminem. It's all about the chemistry-vocally and physically. I won't be surprised if these two were banging each other. They're great together!
I really really love Eminem, since I was a little kid, I grew up with him. I can't understand why he have to pair up with  her, she can't even sing live, I think she is mediocre.

its very fucking sad i mean if your listening to his old songs you know that he did it with heard and passion but now i think hes getting a kind of Mainstream Bitch of course about the Fucking money!!!

God I'm praying to get tickets!!

Let's be honest here, Eminem does NOT need Rihanna to make money, if anything Rihanna is losing a fan base while Eminem is growing each and every time he drops an album. They are good friends, which is the only reason that that they tour together and make songs together.
Ignorance is bliss
Why you people don't understand that Eminem has grown up?DO you think that he can imagine his self singing this type of songs 10-15 years ago? I don;t think so.
He's still doing good plz...that's not so bad! He just Grown-up!! Love him as Slim,as Em, as Marshall..as who he is noww!!
i believe he feels sorry for the hoe and wants to help her get some sense ... playing the missing daddy role .. see what im saying LMAO :P
Eminem and Rihanna are my favourite collaboration ever. No need to be rude. ._.
i need you in my life
